name: v1.6.23
body:
## What's Changed


* null cannot be cast to non-null type kotlin.Boolean : Bug fix by @vivekshindhe
* Timeout JSONObject updated. by @vivekshindhe

name: v1.5.6
body: - Crash fixes.

name: v1.5.1
body:
- Google play SMS policy update.
- Bug fixes

name: v1.4.9
body:
This release:
- UPI payment related improvements.

Documentation is available here: https://razorpay.com/docs/checkout/android/

name: v1.4.8
body:
This release:
- minSDK version updated to 19
- Support removed for TLSv1 for security reasons

Documentation is available here: https://razorpay.com/docs/checkout/android/

name: v1.4.7
body:
This release:
- Minor UX improvements.

Documentation is available here: https://razorpay.com/docs/checkout/android/

name: v1.4.6
body:
This release:
- Minor bug fix related to handling shared preference on SDK update.
- UX improvements.

Documentation for the v1.4.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x)

name: v1.4.5
body:
This release:
- Minor bug fix related to onsaveinstancestate.

Documentation for the v1.4.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x)

name: v1.4.4
body:
This release:
- Fixes an Android 8 related [crash](https://github.com/razorpay/razorpay-android-sample-app/issues/41)

Documentation for the v1.4.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x)

name: v1.4.1
body:
This release:
- Enhances experience for netbanking users - features like save username, show password and auto reading OTP has been added for major banks
- Fixes minor memory leak
- Fixes minor crashes
- `minSdkVersion` changed to `14` from `11`

Documentation for the v1.4.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x)

name: v1.4.0
body:
This release:
- Adds support for maintaining saved cards session across apps for Android Nougat
- Fixes minor [memory leak](https://github.com/razorpay/razorpay-android-sample-app/issues/30)
- Fixes a minor crash
- Introduces `clearUserData` method to clear current user data from Razorpay SDK in case user logs out from your app

Documentation for the v1.4.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v14x)

name: v1.3.4
body:
This release contains a hotfix and it is highly recommended that you upgrade to v1.3.4.

Changelog:
- This release fixes a rare [crash](https://github.com/razorpay/razorpay-android-sample-app/issues/33).

Documentation for the v1.3.x series is available here: https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v13x

name: v1.3.2
body:
This release:
- Improves handling of an Android bug which was causing payment failures for certain payment methods. More info: https://www.chromium.org/developers/androidwebview/webview-ct-bug
- Removes logcat logs created by our error reporting module 
- Fixes minor bugs in our analytics module

Documentation for the v1.3.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v13x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v13x)

name: v1.3.1
body:
This release:
- Fixes compilation issue occurring on the latest android gradle plugin version. More details on this issue can be found here: https://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=221057

Documentation for the v1.3.x series is available here: https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v13x

name: v1.3.0
body:
This release:
- adds support for preloading resources for faster loading of the `Checkout` form.
- has a workaround for an Android bug which caused payment failure for certain payment methods. More info: https://www.chromium.org/developers/androidwebview/webview-ct-bug
- fixes back button behaviour on certain `Checkout` screens

Documentation for the v1.3.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v13x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-checkout-sdk-v13x)

name: v1.2.1
body:
This release fixes a minor bug which causes a rare crash on the dismissal of native loader.

Documentation for the v1.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x)

name: v1.2.0
body:
This release adds support for Razorpay's latest product, [eCOD](https://razorpay.com/ecod).

Documentation for the v1.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x)
Documentation for eCOD is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/ecod](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/ecod)

name: v1.1.0
body:
This release contains bug fixes and performance improvements.

Changelog:
- Added a native circular loader
- Performance improvements
- Better support for the react-native & cordova wrappers
- Minor bug fixes

Documentation for the v1.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x)

name: v1.0.2
body:
This release contains a hotfix and it is highly recommended that you upgrade to v1.0.2.

Changelog:
- Bug fix: App would crash at the start of the payment in devices with Android Nougat

Documentation for the v1.x series is available here: https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x

name: v1.0.1
body:
This is v1.0.1 of Razorpay's Android SDK. This is a _major release_ and it is highly recommended that you upgrade to v1.0.1. We have added quite a few new features and have also improved the overall performance of the SDK.

Changelog:
- Distribution is via Maven Central Repository
- Added support for device authentication as part of [Flash Checkout](https://razorpay.com/flashcheckout/)
- Added optimisations for Netbanking pages
- Improved Auto OTP reading UI
- Improved integration through interfaces
- Improved UI on tablets
- Fixed PayUmoney topup flow. PayUmoney requires localstorage to work.
- Fixed flow for netbanking in Canara bank. Their HTML/CSS required special handling to make it mobile accessible
- Lot of under the hood refinements to make things faster and more robust

Documentation for the v1.x series is available here: [https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x](https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v10x)

Please note that distribution of SDK is now via Maven Central and hence the SDK will not be attached to release notes on GitHub any longer.

name: v0.13.0
body:
This is v0.13.0 of Razorpay's Android SDK.

Change set:
- We now have proper support for picking image for checkout from drawables. No more pesky urls and base64!
- Added support for disabling fullscreen mode in Checkout
- Added extra logging around `onPaymentSuccess` and `onPaymentError` for easier integration.

Documentation for all v0.13.x SDKs is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v013x

This release is signed using our public key, which you can find at https://keybase.io/razorpay

NB: This release was made on 26th May, 2016. For some reason the date here doesn't reflect it. This can be checked [here](https://github.com/razorpay/razorpay-android-sample-app/commit/71e22cd97e907dfeddfc1c60d3aee34ccbe841d9)

name: v0.12.0
body:
This is v0.12.0 of Razorpay's Android SDK.

Change set:
- Added proper support for Marshmallow new permission rules
  - SMS Permission is asked for right at the start of the payment
  - SMS Permission is only asked once. If user denies it, we don't ask again. This is done so that the user does not mark the permission denied as well as "don't ask again" for the entire app.

This is a highly recommended release. Please update at the earliest.

Documentation for all v0.12.x SDKs is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v0111

name: v0.11.2
body:
This is v0.11.2 of Razorpay's Android SDK.

Change set:
- Added extra measures around auto-OTP reading for higher stability

Documentation for all v0.11.x SDKs is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v0111

name: v0.11.1
body:
This is v0.11.1 of Razorpay's Android SDK.

Change set:
- Added a fix for the bug in Android WebView due to which the lower fields would get hidden by keyboard
- Improves control hand over process slightly for better stability on low memory devices

Documentation is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v0111

This is a highly recommended update due to better handling on low memory devices.

name: v0.11.0
body:
This is `v0.11.0` of Razorpay's Android SDK.

Change set:
- Auto OTP reading added for Mobikwik Power Wallet
- Now users are prompted for confirmation if they press back button
- Payments cancelled by user by pressing back button is marked so on the dashboard
- 20+ banks now supported for Auto-OTP reading
- A progress bar has been added in the webview
- Refactored and improved handling on low memory devices

Documentation is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v0110

name: v0.10.0
body:
This is v0.10.0 of Razorpay's Android SDK.

##### \- Change set:
- Fixes issue with auto updating of OTP reading feature
- Older versions of SDK will **not** be receiving auto updates on OTP reading feature any more
- Better handling of network related issues in webview

The documentation is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v0100

##### \- OTP Reading auto-updating feature deprecated for v0.9.x

We have made considerable changes in the architecture of the auto-updating feature for OTP reading. Sadly, this has necessitated ending support for auto-updating on v0.9.x series.

The checkout form auto-updating feature, however, will still be available on v0.9.x series.

name: v0.9.1
body:
This is v0.9.1 of Razorpay's Android SDK.

Change set:
- Implemented central error logging. This will help us in fixing issues in merchant's applications much faster.
- Fixes for few crash reports
- Adds support more banks in OTP reading feature
- Simplifies integration process

The documentation is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v091

name: v0.9.0 Release with OTP feature
body: The documentation is available at https://docs.razorpay.com/v1/page/android-sdk-v090
